reasoning: LVH has documented incidence of approximately 15.5 per 1,000 person-years (155 per 100,000) based on Reykjavik Study and Framingham Heart Study. Prevalence in general population approximately 14-18% (14,000-18,000 per 100k). Using midpoint of 16.5% (16,500 per 100k) for prevalence. LVH is primarily a detected condition with both incidence and prevalence data available.
source: Framingham Heart Study and Reykjavik Study epidemiological data; multiple echocardiographic surveys
